text:
Hello!

Is it possible to search for dynamic pages from hubdb using contentsearch v2?

Like:
```<https://api.hubapi.com/contentsearch/v2/search?portalId=[portalid]&term=download&tableId=[hubdb]>```
so I get results like
```<https://api.hubapi.com/hubdb/api/v2/tables/[hubdb]/rows?portalId=[portalid]>```
But filtered?

Hello! Has any of you implemented Content Security Policy on your HubSpot hosted websites? Including Google Analitycs, Chilipiper, Interkom and other tools for marketing? Do you have any examples of a good CSP? :thinking: Thanks! :)
Hiya, what request are you using to fetch?

Iâ€™d like to know this too. We have a sandbox but I have inherited this environment and have no idea about what is in it compared to prod. 

Terrible practice but I am working live :/
ChatGPT. That's how I recently did it :joy: just gave it all the domains I needed
and for analitycs - you gave it just google domains or any other that analitycs generate? If I go to network tab for example I see requests from twitter, linkedin etc due to analitycs
